summary: Deploy and publish a Caffeine-built app to the Internet Computer (ICP), including providing a working public URL and optional custom domain connection.
architectural_notes: Hosting/deployment target is Internet Computer (ICP) with gateway domains like icp0.io / icp0.app; custom domain (e.g., via GoDaddy DNS CNAME) is optional.
known_issues: Current deployment appears unreachable: ICP gateway cannot resolve destination canister / Error 400 / 'site canâ€™t be reached' when accessing icp0.io/raw/icp0.app URLs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide a working Caffeine public URL for the deployed app (no custom domain required).
Fix/redo the ICP canister deployment so the site is reachable via gateway links.
